title: A strategic approach to utilise H5P.com with your institution
articleSnapshot: A post with a free resource to assist organisations build a business case for H5P.com.
articleBody: The following embedded H5P Course Presentation is a free resource to assist organisations build a business case for H5P.com the SaSS solution for H5P. It uses H5P's Course Presentation was intented to help explain how this technology you benefit your organisation's training needs. Feel free to use it!
